summary: Provides a Home Assistant integration that represents a mailbox as an entity, allowing asynchronous retrieval, management, and deletion of messages, as well as streaming of associated media through HTTP endpoints. Includes platform implementations for connecting to an Asterisk server to fetch voicemail recordings and a demo platform that simulates voicemail behavior.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant users to incorporate voicemail or mailbox functionality into their smart home setup, offering seamless access to voice messages from Asterisk or a simulated source, with capabilities to view, play, and manage messages via the Home Assistant UI and API.
